description: analyzer depends on this as a starting point for its process.
A webhook to be called back once the results are ready via a POST request.
owned_domains will eliminate the risk from these domains and it'll have a direct impact on the results’ total score and returned values.
Any string. It will be used as an identifier for the customer.
false by default, set it to true to run the process in dryrun mode. Use this for testing the APIs as random results will be generated.
